title: Patient Safety-Centered Gradual Assertiveness Training for Nursing Managers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing care knowledge and fundamental communication skills
context.additional_context: Targeting leadership role performers in nursing, focusing on analyzing patient safety cases in practical settings and acquiring response strategies.

learning_goals: Learners can explain assertive communication techniques for patient safety threats by distinguishing three levels (Level 1–3)
Learners can perform assertive expressions for patient safety in simulation cases with ≥80% accuracy
Learners can apply stepwise assertiveness strategies to ≥5 patient safety cases from real work environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
